message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down a bit to $110.  I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
